hackathon-description-text: During the course of the weekend, you and your team will be given the opportunity to analyze datasets from one of the following three categories:

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How original is your discovery? What does is discover? What can be explained with this discovery?
How complex was this project to implement? What technologies were used?
How was this project presented to the judges?

hackathon-location-address: Trottier Bldg, 3630 Rue University, Montreal, QC H3A 2B2, Canada
hackathon-description-header: CodeJam: DataDive is a data analysis hackathon which allows students to explore large real world datasets and use their findings in creating unique and inventive software projects.
